newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ's Anderton backs proposed Labour-NZ First govt.
newsitem.headline: NZ's Anderton backs proposed Labour-NZ First govt.

text.p: Left-wing Alliance leader Jim Anderton said on Tuesday his party would support a proposed coalition between the Labour and New Zealand First parties.
"The Alliance has offered support for a minority Labour-NZ First government under the terms of an agreement approved by the Alliance caucus today," Anderton said in a statement.
"A Labour-NZ First minority government will have certainty that it can win votes on confidence and supply as long as it honours this agreement," Anderton said.
"The agreement means that the Alliance will vote for all our manifesto policies exactly as we said we would during the election campaign."
